name: Escape Room Prototype
description:
This is my first ever jam, Simple escape room game for  Ryan Laley Games Jam 2020, Made it in less than 24 hours , I will try to work on it and add more in the future if you like it I would love to hear your feedback.

You are playing in the mind of a Psycho who is trying to escape the hospital, Everything is in his mind, Can you help him Escape ?

Also I just realized why would anyone help a Psycho to escape ? 😂😂 

Unfortunately I didn't have enough time to build a story for you to get more in the game but you can build your own story and tell me in the comments 😃 enjoy solving this simple puzzle game.

Please Rate & Review ❤️

Controls:

WASD To move

Right Click to zoom

E to interact

Changelog for V1.02 :

*Fixed a bug on playing a new game after you win first time.

*Added in game pause menu.

*Added options menu to help optimize performance.
